overview:
Maria Colacurcio is the vice president of marketing for Smartsheet.com. Before joining Smartsheet.com, Maria was at Microsoft Corporation where she developed marketing campaigns for the 2005 launch of Visual Studio and SQL Server. Prior to Microsoft, she managed all prospect and customer marketing initiatives for Onyx Software Corporation. Prior to Onyx, Maria led the marketing team at NetReality, a Bay area firm which was acquired by Allot Communications. During her tenure, she launched international marketing operations as well as key branding and advertising initiatives.

Source : SmartSheet.com
